name: One Useful Thing (Ethan Mollick)
notes: Practical, evidence-based analysis of how AI reshapes work and education.

name: Simon Willison's Weblog
notes: Essential for AI engineers. Focuses on practical LLM usage, security, and hacking.

name: Ahead of AI (Sebastian Raschka)
notes: Bridges research papers and code. Excellent for understanding new architectures.

name: Interconnects (Nathan Lambert)
notes: Deep analysis of the open-source model ecosystem, RLHF, and technical policy.

name: Chip Huyen
notes: Focuses on 'Real World AI'â€”data infra, MLOps, and production challenges.

name: Marcus on AI (Gary Marcus)
notes: Critical skepticism and realistic assessment of AI hype and limitations.

name: Benedict Evans
notes: Strategic big-picture view. Treats AI as a platform shift.

name: TLDR AI
notes: Summaries of AI/ML news, tools, and papers for practitioners.

name: OpenAI Blog
notes: Primary source for GPT/DALL-E releases and safety research.

name: Google DeepMind Blog
notes: Research and product updates from Google DeepMind (Gemini, AlphaFold).

name: Microsoft AI Blog
notes: Updates on Azure AI, Copilot, and foundational research from MS.

name: Hugging Face Blog
notes: Deep dives into open-source models, datasets, and implementation guides.

name: NVIDIA AI Blog
notes: Focus on hardware acceleration, enterprise AI, and compute infrastructure.

name: Import AI
notes: Jack Clark's newsletter focusing on AI policy, safety, and capabilities.

name: ArXiv (cs.AI)
notes: High volume raw feed of new pre-print papers in Artificial Intelligence.

name: Machine Learning Mastery
notes: Tutorials and how-to guides for applied machine learning.

name: Uber Engineering
notes: Engineering and applied ML posts from Uber (Michelangelo, Horovod).

name: CFA Institute: Enterprising Investor (AI)
notes: High-quality analysis on how AI impacts investment management and ethics.

name: Two Sigma Insights
notes: Technical deep dives from a leading quant fund on data science in finance.

name: Bloomberg Technology
notes: Intersection of markets and tech; tracking AI impact on stock prices.
